mapper.sql: tr.ID, tr.FIRST_BORROW_ID, tr.ACCOUNT, TRUNCATE(tr.ACCOUNT/tr.PLAN_ACCOUNT,3) RATE, tr.USER_ID, tr.USE_MONEY, tr.PLAN_ACCOUNT, tr.REMARK, tr.STATUS, tr.VERSION, tr.ADDTIME, tr.FIRST_TENDER_TYPE, tr.ONBUS_TIME, tr.PARENT_ID, tr.ORDERNUM
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(USE_MONEY) FROM t_first_tender_real WHERE FIRST_BORROW_ID = #{firstBorrowId} and status = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE rocky_b_collectionrecord c INNER JOIN rocky_b_tenderrecord t ON c.TENDER_ID = t.ID SET c.IS_FIRST_BORROW = 2 WHERE 1=1 AND c.FIRST_TENDER_REAL_ID= #{firstTenderRealId} AND t.USER_ID = #{memberId}
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(ACCOUNT) FROM t_first_tender_real where FIRST_BORROW_ID = #{firstBorrowId} and USER_ID = #{userId} AND `STATUS` = 0

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(c.INTEREST),0) from ( SELECT tr.id,ua.APPR_TIME FROM t_first_tender_real tr, t_first_unlock_appr ua where tr.id = ua.FIRST_TENDER_REAL_ID AND tr.`STATUS` = 1 AND ua.`STATUS` = 1 AND tr.id = #{firstTenderRealId} ) tt LEFT JOIN rocky_b_collectionrecord c on(tt.id = c.FIRST_TENDER_REAL_ID AND c.`STATUS` in(1,2,3) AND c.IS_FIRST_BORROW = 2 AND CASE WHEN c.`STATUS` = 1 THEN FROM_UNIXTIME(c.REPAY_YESTIME) <= tt.APPR_TIME ELSE c.ADVANCETIME <= tt.APPR_TIME END )

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(c.REPAY_YESACCOUNT-c.CAPITAL),0) FROM t_first_tender_real tr LEFT JOIN rocky_b_collectionrecord c ON(tr.id = c.FIRST_TENDER_REAL_ID AND c.`STATUS` in(1,2,3) AND c.IS_FIRST_BORROW = 1) WHERE tr.ID = #{firstTenderRealId}
